steps.title: Select ripe mangoes to use.
steps.content: Select ripe mangoes to use. Gently put a very small amount of pressure on them to ensure the hardness of the fruit.

steps.title: Prepare the mangoes.
steps.content: Prepare the mangoes. Use a knife to remove the skin from the fruit. Slice the mango into bite-sized pieces.

steps.title: Place the pieces on a baking sheet.
steps.content: Place the pieces on a baking sheet. [2] X Research source Make sure that the pieces do not touch each other, as it's very difficult to break frozen mangoes apart. It's useful if the sheet has a "lip" or curved section so that the pieces don't fall off. You can always use a shallow casserole dish as a substitute.

steps.title: Place the baking sheet in the freezer on a flat surface.
steps.content: Place the baking sheet in the freezer on a flat surface. [3] X Research source Freeze the fruit for about three to five hours, depending on the thickness of the pieces.

steps.title: Add the frozen mangoes to a freezer zipped bag.
steps.content: Add the frozen mangoes to a freezer zipped bag. [4] X Research source Label accordingly, with the current date, to make yourself aware of its storage time.

steps.title: Freeze the mangoes up to 10 months.
steps.content: Freeze the mangoes up to 10 months. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Combine a cup of sugar and two cups of water in a medium pot.
steps.content: Combine a cup of sugar and two cups of water in a medium pot. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Bring the mixture to a boil, stirring constantly and allowing the sugar to dissolve.
steps.content: Bring the mixture to a boil, stirring constantly and allowing the sugar to dissolve.

steps.title: Allow the mixture to completely cool on the side.
steps.content: Allow the mixture to completely cool on the side.

steps.title: Add the mango pieces in freezer-friendly Tupperware containers.
steps.content: Add the mango pieces in freezer-friendly Tupperware containers. Label accordingly, with the current date.

steps.title: Pour the simple syrup over the mango.
steps.content: Pour the simple syrup over the mango. Leave a 1" (2.54 cm) room at the top for expansion.

steps.title: Freeze the mangoes up to 12 months.
steps.content: Freeze the mangoes up to 12 months.
